PD016.description: Classic milk tea is the original boba tea flavor that started it all.  It consists of black tea, milk, brown sugar, and of course the black tapioca balls we all love so much!
PD016.name: Classic milk tea

PD017.description: Matcha milk tea is a delightful beverage that we can't get enough of - it's sweet, rich, and earthy! Not to mention the tiny yet moreish boba pearls.
PD017.name: Macha milk tea
